transcripts.text: Having used wireless AirPods for like the last year, going to these wired ones kind of sucks, but I think this is just temporary.  Morning.  How are you?  I think I'm good.  You have time for a short interview?  Interview?

Do you want to do a short interview?  or can I explain what I'm doing and then you can consider it?  Yeah.  I'm attempting to do street epistemology, the street version of it.  Okay.  It's where you use questions to gently challenge a person's claim that they make.  Okay.  Because they think that it's true.
Okay.

That's a pretty good way of phrasing it, although it's not to hit you with so many questions that you get confused.  The purpose of the questions is to bring clarity To my own beliefs?  Yes.  What you think is true, the reasons why you think it's true.  Okay.  And then how you concluded that those reasons justify being so sure that it's true.
